recipesJson.name: A new Way of Cheesecake
recipesJson.author: Kelgar78
recipesJson.description: Its a strawberry cheesecake with some newer materials for our cheesecake and our strawberry on the top. I snv cause i cant w8 the steep, otherwise keep it 10 . Cheers

reviews.text: Kelgar78 that's a great recipe !with the combinaton Cheesecake FLV, yes we cheesecake INW and NYcheesecake CAP. manages to bring a whole new dimension to cheesecakes with a whole lota new taste to discover. Ty for that Kelgar!
